title: Africa's Textile & Apparel Industry, at your fingertips
subtext: Discover all your sourcing and product needs in a few clicks. ABANA is a unique B2B platform providing comprehensive solutions for small, medium and large players in the African textile industry
boxTitle: For Fashion Professionals, by Fashion Professionals
boxText:
The Global Apparel Industry is facing its biggest **disruption** in a generation:

New DTC players, online distribution channels, and changes in customer expectations and behaviours are **transforming** the whole value chain as we've known it.

ABANA helps all buyers **(re)discover** Mauritius, Madagascar and Africa’s know-how in fashion-related manufacturing and take advantage of the Region’s duty-free access to the EU, US and China (Mauritius & Madagascar).

Our team brings over **30 years of experience** in manufacturing, sourcing and branding. We understand the distinct needs of all buyers and manufacturers, and provide frictionless, innovative solutions to your specific challenges.
